1077130.name: Revenge
1077130.description:
Experiment with the true fear in Revenge, explore an "abandoned" robot factory as Chris Elbron and try to stay alive long enough to discover all its darkest secrets... if you dare...

Storyline
Horrors await you in Como, Italy, inside the "abandoned" S.E.L.T. Robotics factory, here were made some experiments on robots and artificial intelligence but something went wrong and now the employees seem vanished.

Sent there by its agency, Chris Elbron, a private investigator, breaks into the facility, trying to shed light on what happened, but instead, what he finds is all but science and technology.
Once inside there's no way out but the deep dive into this hell on the earth.

Revenge is a true survival horror experience that aims to show the most terrifying monster of all is the human mind.

Features
  • True survival horror experience: You can't fight, your enemies are too powerful to be defeated, if you want to survive in the factory your only chances are to run or hide.
  • Hide and sneak: stealth-based gameplay with parkour elements
  • Solve puzzles: the facility's security system is one of the most advanced ever... will you be able to hack it to proceed?
  • Unpredictable Enemies: you can't know when and from where one of your enemies will attack you thanks to an advanced AI system.
  • Insane graphics: explore an extremely detailed horror world thanks to AAA-quality graphics and ray-tracing
  • Real horror: Revenge's characters and settings are inspired by real-life factories and robots
